text: svargāvakāśikaḷ narakāvakāśikaḷēāṭ viḷiccucēādikkuṁ: "ñaṅṅaḷuṭe nāthan ñaṅṅaḷēāṭ ceyta vāgdānaṅṅaḷeākkeyuṁ satyamāyippularnnat ñaṅṅaḷ kaṇṭaṟiññirikkunnu. niṅṅaḷuṭe nāthan niṅṅaḷēāṭu ceyta vāgdānaṅṅaḷ yāthārthyamāyi pularnnat niṅṅaḷ nēril kaṇṭ manas'silākkiyēā?” avar paṟayuṁ: "ate.” appēāḷ oru viḷiyāḷan avarkkiṭayil viḷiccaṟiyikkuṁ: "allāhuvinṟe śāpaṁ akramikaḷkkāṇ; sanśayamilla.”
